# 介绍

# Install

npm install cyberpunk-vue

yarn add cyberpunk-vue

# Quick Start

import Vue from 'vue';
import cyberpunk from 'cyberpunk-vue';

Vue.use(cyberpunk);

// or
import {
  Select,
  Button
  // ...
} from 'cyberpunk-vue';

Vue.component(Select.name, Select);
Vue.component(Button.name, Button);
